Author: Xwin
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: We welcome the wonderful XWIN community!  Within the last month, we received a huge number of letters regarding the stage of XWIN game part readiness.  We are pleased to inform you that the public beta-test is being launched today! The ICO participants and those who registered on our platform will get the access. By notification via social networks and indicated e-mails, you will receive a link to full access. In addition to it, we prepare the public testing of the mobile application. This information will be told beforehand.  Your feedback is essential to us. All the technical issues questions arisen during the testing can be sent to our support link support@xwin.io. What is more, you are open to send your suggestions or comments to info@xwin.io.  If possible, make the maximum load on the application and server for testing realization. You can play for free without registration.  An extended press release in regards to further plans and the nearest updates will be provided in coming days.  Gaming platform link - https://8win.io/en

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain

All the token holders receive 20% of margin out of every platform!  Join the functional testing, become a part of the XWIN future success.

Author: Xwin
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: Hello to everyone! We know that many of you miss the XWIN news!  First of all, we want to express our much appreciation to all ICO participants and those who followed the run of its events one more time. We gratitude everybody who helped and supported us!  So, as we said earlier, we are going to launch the gaming part of the platform in the near future. At the moment we conduct the testing and develop a mobile application. We have the maximum number of games from the start. More games will be connected very soon.  Currently, we are ready to attract more community members with renewing the activity of XWIN in the media sources.  For now, we can proudly proclaim that more than 10 341 people have registered as members of the community. It is a great result for us! The XWIN project has collected 793.4432 ETH and 250.7747 BTC. Therefrom, the private investments amount to 20.7747 BTC and 540.4432 ETH. And the share of funds and corporate investments is 230 BTC and 253 ETH. These results give us confidence in our future and inspiration to make the steps following the Road Map.  In total, 1024 people will be the tokens holders after all bounty payments. The members of bounty campaign which we have conducted on BitcoinTalk, Facebook and Twitter are pointed too.  Within the bounty campaign, we attracted more than 600 people, and this result is really great! Not every project can succeed.  From this day, we will try to keep you informed with all news and process of platform development through all our communication lines and by newsletters. That is why we ask those who have not signed up yet to register on our website and be in touch with the news.  With great respect, XWIN team

Author: Xwin
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: Hello to everyone!  In expectation of announcement of the gaming platform launch, you can receive the current information by subscribing to our pages on Facebook, Twitter and Telegram. In addition to the useful information, we also publish the real screenshots of our future platform and the mobile application.  Talking about the stock exchange, one must be said – initially, we did not claim that it was our first priority. As it can be noticed from the experience of others projects, the quick stock exchange listing can lead to a huge decrease in a token value. Here is our position: firstly, we will show the finished product with the tokenholders’ payment system and will conduct a marketing campaign regarding the product launch; secondly, after all these actions we will be completely involved into the product placement on the stock exchanges. The previously conducted negotiations have showed that it is a pretty lobour-intensive process. Plenty of time and a lot of money are needed.  Objectively, we understand this negative attitude towards present situation. On top of all, as statistic shows, more than 60% ICO of 2017 failed, and it is also a significant fact. For all that, we truly hope for your understanding! It is not possible for everyone to provide the finished product just a few months after the end of the token sale.  We will extremely appreciate your patience and the commitment to success!  Stay tuned! The announcement is soon!

Author: Moosearoo
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: I am pretty confused on how to buy some XWIN.  I created an account. I created a wallet from their website (A). I transferred some ETH to the created wallet (A). And now I don't know what to do. I can not view my wallet, or buy any XWIN from the wallet because I do not know how to access the wallet(A).  I thought maybe I should just transfer some ETH from my CoinBase account to the wallet address that is displayed for the transfer(B) but it says only transfer from wallets that you want to get paid back on and make sure they accept tokens. I don't think CoinBase does. Plus, why would they give me the ability to create a wallet if I were to just use a different wallet. This website interface is not doing much for building confidence in XWIN... Am I suppose to transfer ETH from my CoinBase to wallet (B) and then XWIN will transfer XWIN tokens to my ETH wallet (A) that the XWin website created? That seems wrong.  https://ibb.co/esLXpR

Author: monika27
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: Assuming merchants eat the transaction fee as they do for credit card fees, it will save merchants a lot of money (>2%). Note however that for large Bitcoin purchases just doing a standard blockchain transaction will be cheaper than using the LN. Even with current transaction fees, if you pay $1000 for something with Bitcoin with a $5 fee, if LN has a 0.5% fee then it'd also be a $5 LN fee, so using those hypothetical numbers that would be the break even point where $1000 use normal bitcoin transaction. LN is meant for many small purchases and will be much cheaper than Bitcoin when you use it for many small everyday purchases.

Author: Xwin
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: We are happy to welcome the best crypto community XWIN CryptoBet!  2017 is ending and the Pre-ICO XWIN stage is going to be concluded. We have done a lot of work during this period – ranging from jurisdiction choosing and enterprise registering to the continuation of the main project part development and arranging the investment tour of Asian countries. But it is only the beginning of the long way. More is going to be done in 2018. There are a few facts about the project: 1. First of all, we are glad to inform you that more than 3 800 people from all over the world have become XWIN community members during PRE-Ico! 2. More than $ 1 million has been collected in ETH and BTC. And this amount keeps increasing. 3. The XWIN team has conducted a tour of Asian countries (Japan, South Korea, China and Singapore). The series of meetups with investors specializing in ICO investing has been arranged there. The technical and jurisdictional issues, and approaching an Asian market have been discussing. 4. The advisers on legal issues have joined the XWIN team. 5. We have successfully launched the Bounty program. More than 300 people have already registered in a few days. And this number of people keeps growing. 6. We have set DAO Smart contracts, have conducted a test and alpha launch of the gaming platform. 7. The multivalent platforms development and the testing of phone applications are in progress. 8. We have launched a referral system. It has already brought the first income to the participants. 9. We have completed the XWIN LTD legal entity registration and keep working on gambling activity licensing. We look to the future year with hope and confidence! We are fully ready to conduct ICO XWIN CryptoBet and continue the Road Map implementation Until then, please do not forget that the opportunity to buy the tokens with + 40% bonus is coming to an end.   Stay with us and we wish you good New Year holidays!

Author: Xwin
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: Thank you for your opinion. We really want to do a great project with some unique solutions. However, we were so focused on the technical part that we realized that we had no designer in our team too late and thus used freelancers. We aren't really into design, so we totally missed that it was taken from another project, but it should be fixed soon. We're trying to contact a guy who did it. So, with that settled, I'd ask you to concentrate discussion around the technical part of the project. That's where we are ready to discuss every single detail. Afterall, it's technical stuff that really matters and makes one project different from another.

Author: Xwin
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: It is very interesting and rational question. There are several factors of equal importance. 1. Every project starts with the team. It is necessary to point out that in addition to developers and business managers, we have considerable experience in the field of betting and sports forecasting. 2. There is not only great desire, but, most importantly, the ability to make a quality project for the final customer. 3. The project will be implemented regardless of the ICO outcome. Almost a year it has been funded by the co-founders. 4. We’ve established untarnished reputation among the acknowledged masters of the sport. 5. We don’t conduct aggressive advertising campaign and provide discounts and bonuses. We don't scream at the top of our lungs: "Buy now or it will be too late!" 6. Our project is transparent and we participate in conferences in the territory of the CIS. 7.  Yes, it's quite possible that often we aren’t in a close dialogue with the community on the forums, but we try to keep you informed about the main news. Although we aren’t able to generate news every day, most of the time is dedicated to developing. In technical terms, we are PROBABLY not the first, but one of the first who do use and will provide the following: - smart-contracts and all the possible functionality they give - Ethereum blockchain, all information is transparent and can’t be changed - the opportunities of the cryptocurrency with complete anonymity - the private AI development  in the part of algorithms and analysis - and other advantages We hope that it will be a comprehensive answer. Your support is highly appreciated!

Author: mihohil
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet betting platform based on blockchain
Body: [ANN] [ICO] Xwin – CryptoBet   Betting platform based on blockchain   Website  |  White Paper  |  GitHub  |  Twitter    |  Telegram  |  FaceBook   Official XWIN Bounty Campaign tread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2638871.0   What’s XWIN?  During the last several decades, the betting industry has been experiencing serious trust issues caused by speculations and unfair distribution of the prize funds. The blockchain technology is the solution to this problem. We are presenting you XWIN, crypto-bookmaker with the automation of main processes, which allows for the secure betting on different sports.  Football, hockey, tennis, basketball, auto and moto sport, American football, badminton, baseball, biathlon, boxing, volleyball, handball, darts, rugby, mixed martial arts, snooker, chess – it’s only a part of sports you can place bets on using the XWIN platform.  And what stands behind the reliability of this platform?  When you place a bet, you’re making a contract with a system, the conditions of which would be executed regardless of what one of the sides would prefer. The distribution of funds in the decentralized (not controlled by the third parties) platform XWIN is automated, which makes it impossible for anyone to participate in it, or influence its results. The information about all games and bets is secured inside the Ethereum blockchain.  Furthermore, Ethereum guarantees the safety of the funds in your account, availability of constant control and monitoring from any point of the globe, the transparency of transactions and secures the payout.    The AI of the XWIN  XWIN uses artificial intelligence for both calculations of coefficients and scanning of bets, it ensures for the accuracy and speed of calculations, availability of 24/7 monitoring, an instant reaction on changes in the events and mathematical models of higher difficulty.  Verification of results  To prevent the possible attacks and system fraud attempts, XWIN CryptoBet transmits information about the results of events through the trusted addresses. It’s the only element of centralization in the system, but it still remains transparent and can be easily controlled by all community members. All information about parlays, bets, games, prizes, winners, and results is written into XWIN’s smart contract and checked multiple times with several sources of information. Each user is able to review and check the authenticity of the results through their valets and via web – interfaces.   The advantages of investing in XWIN  Due to the obvious advantages of the decentralization, it’s obvious, that is not that distant future many bookmaker platforms will be implementing blockchain technology to ensure the optimal conditions and therefore attract the larger auditory. By the time such projects arrive, XWIN will have already had an active base of users, and thus several advantages, among which are the developed functionality of the system and lower transaction cost. Moreover, participating in ICO gives investors a possibility to become a co-owner of XWIN and hence be free from the additional commission charges.  Once again, the transparency of operations, the security of your personal actives and continuity of the system due to the implementation of the blockchain. None of that may be offered to you by any traditional bookmaker site, and therefore it’s a strong argument towards XWIN.  Commission  Transaction fees are what pays the bills for the existence of platforms. The XWIN commission may fluctuate from 6 to 20% of the bet. This money is credited to the account of the XWIN smart-contract and is automatically divided as such:  •   40% - guarantee fond of payments to the betters; •   30% - PR, marketing, and advertisements; •   10% - administration and legal support; •   20% - revenue, which is divided among the investors   ICO  ICO XWIN CryptoBet has started on 26 of October 2017 and will last exactly 3 months to the 30 of January 2018. The number of coins for the open sales is limited only 80 % XWIN tokens. 20 % XWIN tokens is the blocked share of the founders being available 1 year late. This reserve is a guarantee of the further development of the platform and sustainable growth of the company.     Bounty Funds Distribution  During the ICO XWIN 3% (XWIN tokens) of the funds attracted from the investors is sent to the Bounty Funds Distribution Program. The XWIN team welcomes everyone who wants to join our program to improve or promote XWIN services. Each participant of the Bounty Funds Distribution program will be rewarded with the XWIN tokens. 30% tokens present the remuneration for the developers and technical experts in relation to the XWIN Bounty Funds Distribution program. Developers and technical experts who wish and are able to implement applications, add-ons, plug-ins, interfaces, additional software packages and other IT elements of the system should contact the Development Manager. 70% tokens present the remuneration for participants of the marketing and PR-programs for the XWIN Bounty Funds Distribution.  Mobile Platforms  XWIN is developing WEB – interfaces and mobile apps for Android and IOS, so that you’ll have access to our services anytime, anyplace.     Xwin Team     FAQ Xwin CryptoBet  WHAT IS XWIN CRYPTOBET? XWIN is a transparent and secure betting platform for sporting or other events with a revenue sharing using decentralized smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.  CAN THE XWIN PLATFORM BE TRUSTED? XWIN is a transparent betting platform for sporting or other events with a revenue sharing. The blockchain technology and automatically implemented Ethereum algorithms (smart contracts) offer unique opportunities. Thus, using our platform means a comfortable, safe and guaranteed access to betting for the players, for the bookmakers it is the transparency of the players' transactions, and for the investors it is the guaranteed receipt of income from activity of the bookmaker. XWIN CryptoBet allows you to build a new mechanism of trust and reliably fulfill all the conditions of the bet concluded on the eve of the event. This is the feature of the XWIN betting platform that does not allow violating the conditions prescribed in the smart contract.  WHAT ARE THE COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES OF XWIN COMPARED TO OTHER PLATFORMS? XWIN CryptoBet provides the users with an unprecedented opportunity to become the co-owner of the world's first crypto-bookmaker and receive guaranteed 100% of net income according to the acquired shares during the ICO. The XWIN structure allows to make profit with the minimal interaction. ICO XWIN is performed using the Ethereum smart contract that guarantees continuity and stability of work, as well as safety of investments of investors and players. XWIN is one of the first and currently the only platform for the bookmakers, which is largely protected and safe from the traditional bookmaker market and establishes a real alternative.  WHAT GAMES ARE AVAILABLE FOR BETTING ON THE XWIN PLATFORM? XWIN CryptoBet is a platform for betting on many types of sports: football, hockey, tennis, basketball, auto-motor sport, American football, badminton, baseball, biathlon, boxing, volleyball, handball, darts, E-sports, politics, rugby, mixed martial arts, snooker, chess, show business and many others.  HOW ARE THE BETS PLACED ON THE XWIN PLATFORM? Absolutely all transactions and operations are controlled only by the smart contract XWIN on the Ethereum blockchain. XWIN can be used to place bets on any active games that are in the contract XWIN CryptoBet.  WHAT ARE THE DEDUCTIONS FOR BETTING? Deductions for betting are not charged.  WHO PROVIDES POSSIBLE BETS AND GAME RESULTS? All bets and game results are available on xwin.io  CAN I BE SURE THAT I GET XWIN AFTER TRANSFERRING THE FUNDS DURING ICO? XWIN tokens are sent automatically via the Ethereum smart contract. The XWIN smart contract is available on GitHub in the public domain and is accessible to every person for audit: https://github.com/xwincryptobet/Smart-contracts  IS IT POSSIBLE TO USE ETH? All transactions on the XWIN CryptoBet platform require the use of ETH. In the near future, a solution will be implemented for accepting all of the most popular crypto-currencies.
